description: Cashews add a toasty crunch to this quick and easy vegan stir fry.
name: Plant Based "Chicken" & Cashew Stir Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 sticks celery, sliced at an angle
2 medium capsicums, red and green, sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half the oil to a large wok on a medium high heat and cook the cashews for 23 minutes until toasty and golden. Remove with a slotted spoon and set aside. Add the remaining oil and chicken pieces the wok and cook for 3-4 minutes until golden and a little crisp. Remove from the wok and set aside.
Increase the heat to high and add the celery, capsicum and green beans to the wok. Cook for 34 minutes, add the garlic, spring onions and chilli and cook for 1 more minute.
Whisk the rice wine vinegar, soy sauce and cornflour together in a medium bowl with 200ml of water and add to the wok along with the chicken pieces and cashews.
Simmer for 810 minutes or until the sauce has thickened up, stir in the maple syrup to taste and serve with rice.
